snippet.title: Rayman Lum'o'Grams - Concept Trailer | Rayman Alive x RUNI Showcase 2022
snippet.description:
Game Jolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/Rayman-Lum-O-Grams/770177

In Rayman Lum'o'Grams, you will have to revisit the whole franchise, but with a twist! A mysterious stranger has invaded the universe of our friends and stolen their bodies! Now it is time for Rayman to restore his world by solving puzzles based on Japanese nonograms! Discover the unique styles of each franchise title in a new relaxing gameplay style! Visit such games as classic Rayman, Rayman for Game Boy Color, Rayman for Super Nintendo, Rayman Golf and many others that we will reveal in the near future! In the coming year, we will be sharing a lot of information about the rest of the locations in the game, so make sure you subscribe to our social networks!

In Rayman Lum'o'Grams, we would like to create not only a high-quality nonogram game, but also fill it with unique franchise details, giving every little thing the love for the Rayman series.

But that's not all! Collect Ubi Keys by completing extra nonograms and defeating familiar bosses, with which you can unlock additional worlds full of surprises for true Rayman fans!

Rayman Lum'o'Grams, expect more information in 2023! 

Follow us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RUniverseVK
VK: https://vk.com/raymanuniverse

#Rayman​ #Ubisoft​ #UbiCommunity​ #RaymanUniverse #RaymanAlive
